name: rototiller
effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
short_effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text.x-y: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
